param.name: assignSrc
param.comment: Assign to the source station if it's the players.

param.name: dedicatedServe
param.comment: Will only serve the configured source station

param.name: builder
param.comment: Will wait for build storage needs instead of finding something to do

param.name: producer
param.comment: Will look to supply only factories with products

param.name: lockWares
param.comment: Locks the Users ware selection, otherwise we need to wipe it each time we call the script

param.name: playerBuyMod
param.comment: Owned Station Buy price adjustment, 0=ignore manager price 100= Obey Station Manager's buy offer.

debug_to_file.name: 'travelmule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' could not find buyer for min amount: '+$amount*(0.8^($reduction-1))+ ' min relative price: '+(-$maxBuyRelPrice-(($reduction)f-1.0)*$searchStep-0.001)+', max gates :'+($maxSell+$reduction-1)

debug_to_file.name: 'travelmule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' found buyer: ownername: '+$buyOffer.owner.knownname+'('+$buyOffer.owner.owner.knownname+'), unitprice: '+$buyOffer.unitprice+', amount: '+$buyOffer.amount+', relative price: '+$buyOffer.relativeprice+', totalprice: '+$buyOffer.price+', sector: '+$buyOffer.owner.sector.knownname+', gates from this ship: '+$buyOffer.owner.gatedistance.{this.ship}+', gates from home (from ship if not homebound): '+$buyOffer.owner.gatedistance.{this.ship}+'. selling amount: '+$amount

write_to_logbook.title: 'TravelMule: '+this.ship.knownname+' ( '+this.ship.idcode+' )'
write_to_logbook.text: 'Selling '+$amount+' '+$currentWare+', unitprice: '+$buyOffer.unitprice/100

write_to_logbook.title: 'TravelMule: '+this.ship.knownname+' ( '+this.ship.idcode+' )'
write_to_logbook.text: 'can\'t get rid of '+$amount+' '+$currentWare+' from cargo, what should I do?'

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Selling leftover cargo used up: ' + (player.age-$PerformanceTime) + ' Seconds'

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: '----- No Source Station set. Entering logic block for not $sourceStation'

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: '----- buy from player sell to player build storage'

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: $someNeed.ware + ' target desired amount ' +$targetDesiredAmount + ' supply amount: ' +$supplyAmount + ' ship can hold: ' +$cargoHauled + ' amount will be: ' +$tradeAmount + ' need unitprice: ' +$someNeed.unitprice + ' supp unitprice: ' +$someSupply.unitprice + ' player buy modifier: ' +$playerBuyMod + ' profit: ' +$currentProfit

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode

write_to_logbook.title: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
write_to_logbook.text: 'buying ' +$bestAmount + ' ' +$bestNeedTrade.ware +' from ' +$bestSupplyTrade.owner.knownname +' at ' +($bestSupplyTrade.unitprice.formatted.{'%s %Cr'}) + ' to sell to ' +$bestNeedTrade.owner.base.knownname +' at ' +($bestNeedTrade.unitprice.formatted.{'%s %Cr'}) + ' for a profit of ' +($bestProfit.formatted.{'%s %Cr'})

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode

write_to_logbook.title: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode

debug_to_file.name: 'SupplyMule- ' + this.ship.knownname + ' ' + this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: $someNeed.ware + ' target desired amount ' +$targetDesiredAmount + ' supply amount: ' +$supplyAmount + ' ship can hold: ' +$cargoHauled + ' amount will be: ' +$tradeAmount + ' need unitprice: ' +$someNeed.unitprice + ' supp unitprice: ' +$someSupply.unitprice + ' player buy modifier: ' +$playerBuyMod + ' profit: ' +$currentProfit
